channel.title: Some players can connect to my server. But some players can't?
channel.description:
I have a pretty nice server from 'insidiaX' now I know what your thinking but no. I have edited a lot in it and mixed in a bit of allstar with it. Anyway I can connect to my server just fine, but the problem is the server client has over 300+ downloaded since it's release and there have only been over 2 or 3 players on ever! and I went to my friends house to see if my server worked there and he got an error that is 'error connecting to server' but then after multiple tries he eventually connected and I think this is what is happening with all the other people that try to connect to my server.
I have a doubt its my internet connection, that's what I have come to conclude to.
Notes: I don't have it on a VPS or anything, just on an upstairs computer.
PLEASE HELP ME ANYBODY!!

item.title: Some players can connect to my server. But some players can't?
item.dc:creator: @Krajix Krajix
item.description:
@Krajix wrote:

It is a static IP.

Read full topic

item.title: Some players can connect to my server. But some players can't?
item.dc:creator: @Christmas_tree Christmas_tree
item.description:
@Christmas_tree wrote:

He seemed to have setup the outbound case fine, but it still won’t work. I tried doing it with utorrent. It wasn’t blocked on his computer, but I couldn’t see the port open on my computer

Read full topic
item.source: Some players can connect to my server. But some players can't?

item.title: Some players can connect to my server. But some players can't?
item.dc:creator: @xI_c_E xI c E
item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

Test the port connection at http://www.canyouseeme.org/ and see if it returns a closed connection a lot. Your router could simply be rejecting most of the connections due to faulty firmware or hardware.

Read full topic

item.description:

Krajix:

I now put a server re-starter on my server is restarts every 45 minutes. Will this help?

Almost definately not. Answer my question above and don’t ignore otherwise I cannot help you.

item.title: Some players can connect to my server. But some players can't?
item.dc:creator: @Christmas_tree Christmas_tree
item.description:
@Christmas_tree wrote:

Either you have shitty Internet, your router is filtering out certain outbound connections or your server isn’t set up properly. When they try and connect but fail, does it print into your sever command prompt or does it not?

Read full topic
